cu.explanation_en: Setting the NG AMF IP address to an invalid format like '999.999.999.999' will cause network connection failures and prevent proper AMF communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum transmit power to 100 dBm exceeds the maximum allowed power and may cause hardware damage or transmission failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大傳輸功率設定為 100 dBm 超過允許的最大功率，可能導致硬體損壞或傳輸失敗。
